author: Rosie
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Aurora!
Most of this cog's functionality requires enabling slash commands.
You can find the source code of this cog [here](https://coastalcommits.com/cswimr/SeaCogs).
name: Aurora
short: A full replacement for Red's core Mod cogs.
description: Aurora is a fully-featured moderation system. It is heavily inspired by GalacticBot, and is designed to be a more user-friendly alternative to Red's core Mod cogs. This cog stores all of its data in an SQLite database.
end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores the following information:
- User IDs of accounts who moderate users or are moderated
- Guild IDs of guilds with the cog enabled
- Timestamps of moderations
- Other information relating to moderations
